Posts.Content: Nov 22, 2015 01:29PM Dana1077 wrote: I had to get a follow-up mammogram, with ultrasound, found a mass of 15mm. Radiologist findings BIRAD 5, had biopsy on my left breast, and the did a biopsy of my lymph nodes, will get my results on Monday 11/23. Not to mention, Cancer runs in my family on my mother's side. My son died 10yrs ago from ALL. What are the chances of the mass being malignant?
Posts.Title: ultrasound results birad 4 likely fibroadenoma nervous321
